All Classes

Class Description
ApolloController
Extension of the GodController class that modifies the turn according to Apollo's God Power.
ArtemisController
Extension of the GodController class that modifies the turn according to Artemis's God Power.
AthenaController
Extension of the GodController class that modifies the turn according to Athena's God Power.
AtlasController
Extension of the GodController class that modifies the turn according to Atlas's God Power.
Board
Stores information about the 25 Cells that make up the Board.
Card
Describes a specific God Card.
CardView
Represents a view of the Card class to the Client.
Cell
Describes the state of each of the 25 Cells composing the Board.
CellView
Represents a view of the Cell class to the Client.
ChooseCards
Message sent from the server to a client to ask him to choose among some cards.
ChooseGameName
Message sent from the server to a client to ask him to choose the name of the Game.
ChooseGameRoom
Message sent from the server to a client to ask him to choose the Game room to play in.
ChooseNickname
Message sent from the server to a client to ask him to choose his nickname.
ChoosePlayersNumber
Message sent from the server to a client to ask him to choose the number of players for the Game.
ChoosePosition
Message sent from the server to a client to ask him to choose a position between those available.
ChooseStartingPlayer
Message sent from the server to a client to ask him to choose the starting Player.
ChooseStartJoin
Message sent from the server to a client to ask him to choose between starting a new Game or joining an existing one.
ChooseYesNo
Message sent from the server to a client to ask him to choose a position between those available.
CLI
Command Line Interface for the Client.
ClientCLI
Starts a Client using the Command Line Interface.
ClientGUI
Starts a Client using the Graphical User Interface.
Deck
Describes all the Cards available for the Game and the 2 or 3 cards effectively picked up and used.
DemeterController
Extension of the GodController class that modifies the turn according to Demeter's God Power.
DisplayBuild
Message sent from the server to a client to display a new build.
DisplayGameInfo
Message sent from the server to a client to display new information about the current Game.
DisplayMessage
Message sent from the server to a client to display a message from the server.
DisplayMove
Message sent from the server to a client to display a new move.
DisplayPlaceWorker
Message sent from the server to a client to display a new Worker being placed.
ErrorMessage
Error message sent from a client to the server.
Game
Describes the current state of the Game.
GameBoardController
Handles the interaction between client and server during the Game.
GameController
Creates, sets up and plays out a specific Game, handling player connections and disconnections.
GameEndedException
Thrown when the Game is ended unexpectedly.
GameLobbyController
Handles the interaction between client and server during the choice of starting a new Game or joining an existing one.
GameOverController
Handles the interaction between client and server during the ending phase of the Game.
GameSetupController
Handles the interaction between client and server during the phase of choosing the God Cards to use for the Game.
GameStartingController
Handles the interaction between client and server during the phase of waiting for Players to join a Game.
GameView
Represents a view of the Game class to the client.
GodController
Template for all the God specific turn controllers.
GUI
Graphical User Interface for the Client.
GUIManager
Manager for the GUI class.
HephaestusController
Extension of the GodController class that modifies the turn according to Hephaestus's God Power.
HestiaController
Extension of the GodController class that modifies the turn according to Hestia's God Power.
IllegalBuildException
Thrown when a Player tries to build on a domed Cell.
IllegalMoveException
Thrown when a Player tries to move his Worker to a domed or occupied Cell.
IOExceptionFromController
Extends IOException to include a reference to the PlayerController it was generated from.
JoinGameController
Handles the interaction between client and server during the phase of joining an existing Game.
LimusController
Extension of the GodController class that modifies the turn according to Limus's God Power.
Logger
Writes server information and error messages to a log.txt file.
LoginController
Handles the interaction between client and server during the login phase of a Player.
MedusaController
Extension of the GodController class that modifies the turn according to Medusa's God Power.
Message
Abstract class that represents information shared between client and server.
MinotaurController
Extension of the GodController class that modifies the turn according to Minotaur's God Power.
NewGameController
Handles the interaction between client and server during the creation of a new Game.
NotifyDisconnection
Message sent from the server to a client to notify him about the disconnection of a Player.
NotifyGameOver
Message sent from the server to a client to notify him that the current Game is over.
NotifyGameStarting
Message sent from the server to a client to notify him about the disconnection of a Player.
NotifyLoss
Message sent from the server to a client to notify him that he lost the current Game.
NotifyWin
Message sent from the server to a client to notify him that he won the current Game.
PanController
Extension of the GodController class that modifies the turn according to Pan's God Power.
Ping
Ping message sent from the server to a client.
Player
Describes the state of a Player within a specific Game.
PlayerController
Controls a specific Player's turn.
PlayerView
Represents a view of the Player class to the Client.
Pong
Ping reply sent from a client to the server.
PrometheusController
Extension of the GodController class that modifies the turn according to Prometheus's God Power.
SendBoolean
Message sent from a client to the server to send a boolean.
SendInteger
Message sent from a client to the server to send an integer.
SendIntegers
Message sent from a client to the server to send an ArrayList of Integers.
SendString
Message sent from a client to the server to send a String.
Server
Server instance that handles games and connections with players.
ServerApp
Starts a new instance of the Server class.
ServerClosed
Message sent from the server to a client to notify him that the server has closed.
TableItem
Represents an item for the Table containing information about the active Game rooms.
TitleController
Handles the starting screen of the game.
ToClientMessage
Abstract class that represents a generic message sent from the server to a client.
ToServerMessage
Abstract class that represents a generic message sent from a client to the server.
TritonController
Extension of the GodController class that modifies the turn according to Triton's God Power.
UI
Represents the Client's User Interface, which is implemented by the GUI and the CLI.
VirtualView
Handles the serialization of messages from server to client and the deserialization of messages from client to server.
Worker
Describes a Player's Worker within a specific Game.
WorkerView
Represents a view of the Worker class to the Client.
ZeusController
Extension of the GodController class that modifies the turn according to Zeus's God Power.
